thread.title: Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece
thread.title_full: Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece - US News

author: USNews
title: Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece
text:
Fiorina not backing down on distortion of Planned Parenthood, uses it as campaign centerpiece FILE - In this Sept. 18, 2015, file photo, Carly Fiorina speaks to supporters at the Take Back America Presidential Forum in Greenville, S.C. Fiorina has spent the last two weeks doubling down on her erroneous descriptions of videos secretly recorded by anti-abortion activists, and she shows no sign she'll back off her misrepresentations as she makes her strident opposition to Planned Parenthood a centerpiece of her 2016 campaign. (AP Photo/Richard Shiro, File)
Associated Press Oct. 3, 2015 | 3:00 a.m. EDT + More By BILL BARROW, Associated Press
GREENVILLE, S.C. (AP) â€” For two weeks, Republican presidential hopeful Carly Fiorina has been repeating an erroneous description of videos secretly recorded by anti-abortion activists.
Again on Friday, Fiorina said she "absolutely" stands by her criticism of Planned Parenthood.
At the second GOP debate, she described a video as showing a fully formed fetus on a table, with legs kicking, while someone talks about keeping it alive to "harvest its brain."
But that detailed scene does not occur in the videos.
In one, a woman discusses harvesting the brain of an aborted fetus. But video producers say the image shown is stock footage of a stillborn baby, not from abortion, and comes from a hospital procedure unconnected with Planned Parenthood.
Still, Fiorina has dug in, making her stance against Planned Parenthood a campaign centerpiece.
